# Vendored third-party code: @phukon/duckduckgo-search

This directory vendors the exact published artifacts from npm package:
- Name: `@phukon/duckduckgo-search`
- Version: `1.1.0`
- Tarball: `https://registry.npmjs.org/@phukon/duckduckgo-search/-/duckduckgo-search-1.1.0.tgz`
- SHA1 (npm shasum): `ce4dda7c461970b0bafcf882fcbc776be8d09cbb`

Included files copied from upstream tarball:
- `index.js` (from `dist/index.js`)
- `index.d.ts` (from `dist/index.d.ts`)
- `LICENSE`
- `UPSTREAM-README.md`
- `UPSTREAM-package.json`

License:
- Upstream is MIT licensed.
- Original license text is preserved in `LICENSE`.

Notes:
- We vendor this package to reduce external runtime dependency risk while preserving the existing DuckDuckGo default behavior.
- Functional behavior should remain aligned with upstream `1.1.0` unless explicitly changed in this repository.
